is merging things, but the book is still at the centre,'' Sethi said. Patrick French agreed that technology, if well-managed, could actually help win books new friends and wider sales. Digital e-books have created a space for discussion. Books now have websites and forums, and so reading books on electronic devices has created communities and interaction, he said. Report Abuse I sincerely hope the Egyptian people eventually will win their freedom. However, the Cairo museum is one of the world's greatest museums. It's artifacts are beyond price. They are the cultural heritage of the Egyptian people representing one of the world's earliest and greatest civilizations. It would be a tragedy for Egypt and it's people if the Cairo Museum were looted and trashed like the Bagdad Museum. Report Abuse " Headline:`` Egypt's museums and monuments are deserted'' "

is handing over the CEO title at Google to cofounder Larry Page NEW YORK( CNNMoney)-- Eric Schmidt will step down from his role as Google's CEO in April and be replaced by co-founder Larry Page . We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time, Eric Schmidt said in a prepared statement.`` By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company.''
